product_name: Outdoor Products Power Pack Sling Daypack
long_description: The Outdoor Products Power Pack Sling daypack offers sleek, low-bulk protection for your 15 in. laptop and carries some of those necessities you can't leave the house without. Fleece-lined, foam-padded, exterior-access laptop compartment protects your 15 in. laptop. Large main pocket holds files, books, folders and other large items. Roomy organizer pocket has numerous slot, zip, neoprene and mesh pockets for digital gear; securely stash your tablet in its own foam-padded slot pocket and keys on a fob. Exterior pockets stash your cash and essentials; daypack also includes hidden valuables pocket on the back, expandable mesh front stash pocket and a lined sunglasses pocket. Top carry strap has a soft-grip textured handle. Padded, main strap with quick-release buckle adjusts to the perfect fit; cross-body stabilizer strap with quick-release buckle secures pack when riding a bike. Padded back panel with breathable mesh fabric keeps the Power Pack Sling daypack comfortable against your back; rugged polyester fabric offers long-lasting durability.
short_description: The Outdoor Products Power Pack Sling daypack offers sleek, low-bulk protection for your 15 in. laptop and carries some of those necessities you can't leave the house without.
